item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello visitor! My name is Matt Anger and I am a software engineer! This is my personal site. You can reach me on: Github: https://github.com/angerm LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/mattanger/ Keybase: https://keybase.io/angermcs

item.title: My First Post
item.description: So this exists I am testing a new static site generator, because I didn’t like the old one. Hopefully I like this one more!
